Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy expressed his excitement about the performance despite the 0-0 draw.
Bellamy believes that the team will improve as they spend more time together and learn the finer details.
Others: The match was Craig Bellamy's first as a manager for Wales.
Baris Yilmaz was sent off for a second yellow card.
Kieffer Moore required stitches after a collision with Caglar Soyuncu.
